name: Apparel and Footwear
description: This category encompasses clothing, shoes, and accessories, catering to diverse consumer preferences and seasonal trends.

name: Beauty and Personal Care
description: Products in this category include cosmetics, skincare, haircare, and personal hygiene items, focusing on enhancing consumer well-being and appearance.

name: Consumer Electronics
description: Encompasses devices such as smartphones, laptops, home entertainment systems, and wearable technology, driving innovation and connectivity.

name: Home and Kitchen Appliances
description: This category includes essential household items like refrigerators, microwaves, and vacuum cleaners, aimed at improving domestic efficiency and comfort.

name: Furniture and Home Decor
description: Products designed to furnish and decorate living spaces, including sofas, tables, lighting, and decorative items, enhancing home aesthetics and functionality.

name: Health and Wellness
description: Includes nutritional supplements, fitness equipment, and health monitoring devices, focusing on promoting a healthy lifestyle and well-being.

name: Food and Beverage
description: Comprises packaged foods, beverages, and gourmet products, addressing consumer demand for convenience, taste, and nutrition.

name: Sporting Goods and Outdoor Equipment
description: Products designed for sports, fitness, and outdoor activities, including apparel, gear, and accessories, supporting active lifestyles.

name: Toys and Games
description: Encompasses a wide range of products for children and adults, including educational toys, board games, and electronic gaming devices.

name: Automotive Parts and Accessories
description: Includes components and accessories for vehicles, such as tires, batteries, and car care products, ensuring maintenance and enhancement of automotive performance.
